masterPassword.title: Master Password
masterPassword.unlockDescription: Enter your master password to decrypt your saved channels.
masterPassword.createDescription: Set a master password to encrypt your channel configurations. This keeps your encryption keys secure.
masterPassword.migrationDescription: Your channels are stored without encryption. Set a master password to protect them, or continue without persistence.
masterPassword.skipPersistenceDescription: Channels will only be stored in memory and will be lost when you close the browser.
masterPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
masterPassword.encryptionFailed: Failed to encrypt data. Please try again.
masterPassword.resetStorageDescription: Forgot your password? Reset all data to start fresh.
masterPassword.resetWarning: This will delete all saved channels and their encryption keys.
masterPassword.saveToSessionDescription: Your password will be saved in session storage and cleared when you close the browser.

addChannel.title: Add Channel
addChannel.description: Enter a channel name to connect. Optionally add an encryption key.
addChannel.keyPlaceholder: Enter key if logs are encrypted

decryption.title: Decryption Key
decryption.description: Enter your key to decrypt encrypted logs.

generator.title: Key Generator
generator.description: Generate a new key to use in your transport configuration.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete logs for {{channel}}?
deleteConfirmation.description: This action cannot be undone. All logs for this channel will be permanently deleted from your browser storage and the server.

decryptionFailed.title: Decryption Failed
decryptionFailed.description: Could not decrypt this log entry. Please check that you've entered the correct encryption key.
